name: The Lords Domaine
description:
DESCRIPTION
The Lords Domaine welcomes you in a former 15th century Lordship. When you arrive on the site, it is first of all the turret and its porch that you discover. Then you enter the inner courtyard and you discover the two farmhouses, the bread oven and the stone well. Then comes the wooded park with its hundred-year-old trees. In 1990 extensions to the rear of the building made it possible to create large reception rooms.
This Domaine is a place steeped in history and even has weapons from the domains past on site The family weapons (Avril/Apuril family) is a family of the French nobility , from the Duchy of Brittany. The first known head of the family, Pierre Avril was knighted in 1423 by the Duke of Brittany John V. The domaine was ennobled in 1423 by the Duke.
It is possible to privatize one or more rooms or the entire area for your wedding so that you can enjoy the place in peace. Access to the rooms will depend on the formula selected, this is 100% customizable. With its 2 banquet rooms with sound plus 1 large dance hall and a bar, The Lords Domaine is the ideal place full of charm for a wedding or any event.
The estate has several restaurant rooms with stage and a bar. Possible rental : white chairs, chair covers, chair belts, knots, round table (on request) You also have the option of using an outside caterer.
Our formulas & options
Wine reception
Variety of menus
A la carte options
Wedding return
Privatization of the premises
Professional DJ and / or musician (s) singers, etc.
Our strengths
A renovated domain
2 reception rooms, one with a stage
A dance hall
A bar
A pétanque court
A wooded park
Capacity for up to 250 people
Group beds 20 people
Possibility of tents and camper vans
We can accommodate 150 people seated, 250 people for cocktails, but we can have 250 people seated for hire in a tent.
Want sensational days or crazy nights for your wedding in an incredible place in Brittany? Trust us to organize new and unforgettable events in our field , we are at your disposal to make all your wishes come true. Want to discuss your project or learn more about our collaboration options? Do not hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to help and accompany you.
